definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: [[חָבֶר]] (LXX Caber) the Kenite, husband of Deborah Ju Jdg 4:11, Jdg 4:17, Jdg 4:17, Jdg 4:21, Jdg 5:24.

a man of Asher [[חִבֶר]] Ge 46:17 (P) LXX Xobwr 1Ch 7:31, 1Ch 7:32 LXX Xaber LXXL Iexober; [[חֵבֶר]] Nu 26:45 LXX Xober; on poss. identif. with Ḫabiri of Tel el Amarna v Jastr:JBL 1892, xi. 118 ff. 1893, xii. 61 ff
[[חֶבֶר]] name in Judah 1Ch 4:18 LXX Abeisa, LXXL Aber.
[[חָָבֶר]] a Benjamite 1Ch 8:17 LXX Abar LXXL Aber.
